text.0_, 119_Siman, 0_Seif, 0_Paragraph: A lined vessel is talking about an earthenware pot that is lined in lead.
text.0_, 119_Siman, 1_Seif, 0_Paragraph: The Issur v’Heter also applies the lined vessel rule to where lined with glass.
text.0_, 119_Siman, 2_Seif, 0_Paragraph: The Rema’s opinion disagrees with the initial view regarding lined items.

work: Siftei Kohen on Shulchan Arukh, Yoreh De'ah
